data.text: N ma walikɛɛn ni i ra,
A mi sɔnxɔ sɔnxɔɛ,
a mi xaye yidɔxini girɛ.
A mi xadanma,
Alatala ito nan falaxi, Ala
“N tan Alatala,
alogo i xa danxutɔne yɛɛne rabi,
“Alatala nan n tan na,
Fe singene bata yelin kamalɛ,
Ɛ bɛti nɛnɛn ba Alatala xa,
Tonbonna nun a taane xa e xuini te,
Binyen xa fi Alatala ma!
Alatala minima nɛn alo sofa wɛkilɛxina,
Xabu waxati xunkuye,
N geyane nun yire matexine kalama nɛn
N danxutɔne rasigama nɛn kiraan xɔn
Koni naxanye e yigi sama suxurene yi,
Ɛ tan tuli xɔrine, ɛ tuli mati!
Danxutɔna nde ra,
I bata fe gbegbe to,
Alatalaa tinxinna fe ra,
Anu, yama yiigelitɔ halagixini ito mato!
Nde a tuli matima ito ra ɛ yɛ?
Nde Yaxuba bɔnsɔnna soxi a yaxune yii,
Nayi, a yi a xɔlɔ gbeen nagodo e fari
